tool_description: This API is your gateway for information on world financial markets with respect to country wise. Included are World Stock Markets, Indices Futures, Commodities and much more in future.
name: Global Stock Market API Data
title: Global Stock Market API Data

api_list.name: Get Most Popular News
api_list.description: Featured here: links to the most widely read news articles from all sections as determined by readers.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-stock-market-api-data.p.rapidapi.com/news/most_popular_news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-stock-market-api-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Latest News
api_list.description: View the latest financial news articles published on Investing.com. Read the most recent stories and breaking news, covering all aspects of financial markets worldwide, including commodities, stocks, currencies, indices and more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-stock-market-api-data.p.rapidapi.com/news/latest_news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-stock-market-api-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
